properties.entry: SELECT DISTINCT CKTL_NO, CKTL_NM, CKTL_CONTENT,ACL_LEVEL, SGR_LEVEL, IMG_NO,IMG_PATH FROM COCKTAIL JOIN COCKTAIL_IMG ON(IMG_NO=CKTL_IMG_NO) JOIN COCKTAIL_AMOUNT USING (CKTL_NO) JOIN INGREDIENT USING (INGR_CODE) WHERE INGR_NAME LIKE ? OR CKTL_NM LIKE ? OR CKTL_CONTENT LIKE ?

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A. * FROM( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_NM, TO_CHAR(BOARD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BOARD_DT, READ_COUNT FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_ST = 'Y' AND (BOARD_TITLE LIKE ? OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE ?) AND BOARD_CD =1 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC )A
